ComicInfo.Title: Thicker Than Blood
ComicInfo.Summary:
In the conclusion of “The Big Bang,” Brickhouse’s conspiracy leads the Syndicate to Holy Cross Hospital, which doubles as a SYSTEM stronghold. As the gang fights its way through a laboratory of horrors, Rob Chaplik gets the evidence she needs to expose City Hall’s cover-up of the Big Bang.
The attack on the hospital that held Brickhouse is underway, everyone is prepared to give everything as long as they bring the hospital down with them. The truth behind the System is revealed and the horrible experiments are revealed, will the Bloods relieve the experiments of their pain and anguish or will the System stop them in their tracks.
As the dust settles from the attack, one of the core members of the Blood Syndicate will live their last moment.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-21 06:39:44. [CVDB135142]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Arvell Jones, James Fry, Arvell Jones, James Fry III
ComicInfo.Characters: Boogieman, Brick House, DMZ, Dogg, Fade, Flashback, Masquerade, Mom, Rob Chaplik, Tech-9, Third Rail, Wise Son
